local_intent: Execute a reliable bread grasp: ensure visibility with retry, open gripper, move above, align precisely, compute pinch grasp, pick, then verify stability.
assumptions: Bread and approach pose are reachable
coherence_with_global: Matches the global grasp segment: perception with retry, open, move above bread, approach and align, compute grasp pose (bread_grasp), perform Pick, and confirm IsGraspStable.
